Original Data:

01111110 11000000 00110100 00001000 11111100 00010011 10100010 11000000
00000000 01011100 11000000 00011111 00000000 00000000 00100000 01100000
01000111 11001100 00010011 11110000 10010011 11100000 11111011 00101000
10111011 10101000 11000000 11111011 00000000 10101000 00000000 00000000
10000000 11111000 00000000 00000000 11100000 00001011 00001010 00010000
11000000 00010111 11001110 01000100 00000000 00000000 11001111 10100110
11000110 01001110 10100110 00101110 00000101 10110111 10100110 11001111
11001111 10000111 11100111 10100110 00000101 11001111 10010110 00011110
01101110 10100111 01111110

01111110 // Flag

11000000 // Address field
         // Translates to 00000011, 0x03
         // LAPB DCE -> DTE command or DTE -> DCE response
         // Single-link operation

00110100 // Control field
         // Translates to 00101100
         // [7:5] = N(R) = 1
         // [4] = P/F = 0, No command subframe
         // [3:1] = N(S) = 6
         // Last bit == 0, Information Frame

// Data

00001000 11111100 00010011 10100010 11000000 00000000 01011100 11000000 
00011111 00000000 00000000 00100000 01100000 01000111 11001100 00010011 
11110000 10010011 11100000 11111011 00101000 10111011 10101000 11000000 
11111011 00000000 10101000 00000000 00000000 10000000 11111000 00000000 
00000000 11100000 00001011 00001010 00010000 11000000 00010111 11001110 
01000100 00000000 00000000 11001111 10100110 11000110 01001110 10100110 
00101110 00000101 10110111 10100110 11001111 11001111 10000111 11100111 
10100110 00000101 11001111 10010110 00011110

0110111010100111 // FCS

01111110 // Flag
